snippet: A labor dispute at the General Theological Seminary in Manhattan springs from complaints about mismanagement and offensive comments attributed to its new dean.
abstract: Eight of 10 full-time faculty at New York's General Theological Seminary are fired for walking off the job in order to protest mismanagement and offensive comments by school's dean and president, Rev Kurt H Dunkle; incident means that school is once again in turmoil only a few years after avoiding bankruptcy in 2010.
lead_paragraph: A labor dispute at the General Theological Seminary in Manhattan springs from complaints about mismanagement and offensive comments attributed to its new dean.

headline.main: Seeking Dean’s Firing, Seminary Professors End Up Jobless
headline.print_headline: Seeking Dean’s Firing, Professors End Up Jobless
